p: The finest program I've ever seen and heard on TV was Dick Cavett's last night. You were and are superb. My husband, children and grandchildren all loved it. I hope Channel 7 will do a

I've always loved your poetry but I also love the way you give it your wisdom, your humanity, your strength, your sense of honor and common sense, your closeness to nature and to God- all of this and more- you breathed into your short one hour (minus commercials).
You have dwarfish anyone who has ever been on TV including Mr. Frost.
I hope you have done some recording on records that we may buy.
Thank you for a memorable evening. My nintey year old mother-in-law was thrilled, too.
